name: Fall 2016 - 470 - Escape from Rogue Planet
description:
All donations go directly to the Computer Graphics Club at Chico State, less a 10% donation to Itch.IO for hosting services

Escape from Rogue Planet is a 3D action RPG game with focus on fast paced melee combat and exploration. Player have to find a way to escape from the confinement facility on Rogue Planet.

Player controls a character starting in a small prison cell and have to find an escape out of a dungeon filled with enemies. Player can find different weapons on the way out and use them to perform a variety of attacks in order to take down enemies while dodging their attacks and projectiles. Each weapon has different movesets and special abilities that require skills and tactics to use effectively.

System requirements:

  • Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD® FX-6300
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 750 Ti / ATI Radeon HD 7950
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
  • Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD® FX-8350
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 970 / ATI Radeon R9 series
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 25 GB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device

Note: Currently, there is no sound effect. We are going to add them in the next update soon.

Credits: This is a experimental project made in 3 and a half months by a team of three Computer Animation and Game Development students from CSU Chico.

Odyssey Games -

  • Rick Dao: Lead Game Designer, Level Designer, 3D artist.
  • Daniel Kelly: 3D Artist.
  • Ying Xiong: Programmer.

Special thanks to: Mike Kennedy as Post Production Programmer and Debugger.
